messages.subject: Hoping to read from you
messages.body:
Dearest One,  
     
How is everything? I know it's all good.Thank God. I am excited  to be writing you today. My name is Mira Clarks, a Cote D' Ivoire. Presently I am residing  here in Dakar Senegal , as a result of the civil war which took place in my country. I am a 22 year old girl, about 5'10" tall.
By the grace of God we made my way to a nearby country Senegal where I 'm presently living in a refugee camp. I would like to know more about you. Your likes and dislikes,your hobbies and what you are doing presently. I will tell you more about myself in my next mail.
I attach here my picture for you, though i am not all that photogenic,i hope you wouldn't mind.i am waiting for your reply!
Much Love,
Mira

Much Love,
Mira

messages.subject: Contact The Bank For The Possibilities of Transfer
messages.body:
My Dearest Arnold, 
 
Good...day to you and how are you getting on?.I do hope that you are catching up with the goodies of the day  in full.Mine here is very hot and like you know we are living in the refugee camp here in Dakar Senegal.I have internet access from the admistrative office which I clean everymorning. 
Here is my number (00221 77-353-58-64)  I will like to hear from you as soon possible please.. As a refugee here i don't have any right or privilledge to any thing be it money or whatever because it is against the law of this country.That is why I have been told to serch for a foreign partner.
Please listen to this,I have my late father's death certificate here with me which I will send to you latter,because when he was alive he deposited some amount of money in a leading bank in Europe which he used my name as the next of kin,the amount in question is $2,450,000(Two million ,Four Hundred and Fifty Thousand Dollars).  
So I will like you to help me transfer this money to your account and from it you can send some money for me to get my travelling documents and air ticket to come over to meet with you.
   I have been working here for a long time now. Please try and contact the bank in London, tell them that you are my representative. That you will like to assist  me claim my money that is deposited into their bank. 
    when they transfer the money to your position then I will come over to your country. I really cant wait to get away from the death camp. Please go ahead and contact the bank as i have already told them about you.
  The contact information of the bank is as follows, 
         LLOYD'S TSB BANK OF LONDON 
 
Email addresses : lloydsstb@london.com 
The name of the my father's account officer  is
MR JOHN STORAN  
Tel +44 7031842420
Fax +44 7024014287
 
Here is the secret Ref code of our money.
LlodysBank/Dr.John Clarks/254668/A-92/01
When you contact the bank tell them that you are my representative and that you want to assist me transfer my money to your account due to my refugee status here in Dakar Senegal. 
 
Yours,
 
Miss Mira Clarks.

messages.body:
Dear Mr. Wade,

Mr. Arnold Wanker, a customer of ours, has given me
permission to give you a prod regarding a loan
application he recently made, to wit a cash advance of
$2500.

Here at Third Onanists' Credit Union, we take pride in
bending over backwards to accommodate our customers.
This is why I am contacting you: ordinarily, given Mr.
Wanker's level of income and the lack of collateral, I
would have a hard time giving him the thumbs up.
However, he recommended that I discuss the matter with
you - please could you give me a summary of what the
money will be used for, so that I can try and
determine whether I can squeeze it in to one of the
special loan programs at the bank?

Thanks and best regards

Finbarr Saunders

branch

messages.body:
Dear Mr. Wade,

Thanks for the rapid reply. I think the easiest way
for me to get this one off is for an upstanding, erect
citizen like yourself to stand guarantor for the loan.
The procedure for this isn't hard: please send me
copies of:

(a) A signed letter stating you're willing to
guarantee the loan;

(b) A copy of your ID;

(c) A copy of a recent bank statement in your name
showing you have sufficient funds to cover the loan.

Hope you're OK with this - I know that sometimes the
procedures for these loans can be hard to penetrate,
but with your help I think we can have a nice smooth
ride on this one.

Regards

Finbarr Saunders

messages.body:
Dear Mr. Wade,

I recently had an unfortunate phone conversation with
Mr. Wanker, and it would appear that his wad has been prematurely spent. Apparently he was involved in a motor vehicle accident that caused significant damage to one of the stores in downtown Choadtown, and hence $2000 of Third Onanists' money has been confiscated by the police. Between you and me, it would seem that Mr. Wanker has a drinking problem - I have to admit that I also like a good stiff one inside me when I get home from work, but he takes it to an extreme. 

Sorry to gang up on you and take you from behind like
this, but I remind you that you signed on as guarantor
for the loan, which is due to be repaid this coming
Monday, November 12. 

Sincerely

Finbarr Saunders
